SEEKING VUE DEVELOPERS | ONSITE | NYC | HappyFunCorp (http://happyfuncorp.com) - We're always in the market for good developers and excellent project managers. We're currently particularly looking for Vue.js developers work on-site in NYC (which is unusual for us; most of our work is remote.)

About us: we do web, app, and (increasingly) blockchain development for a panoply of clients ranging from Fortune 500 to brand-new startups. Right now the distribution is roughly 50-50. We prefer people with a reasonable amount of experience under their belt, but there are always exceptions. And we pay well.

If interested, email: jobs@happyfuncorp.com
